author: Rubberman202

text: Well it may be the original name, but Fassad is actually a more fitting translation than merely putting Yokuba.  According to a quick search, Yokuba roughly translates to excessive greed in Japanese.  Giving him the name Fassad, IE facade, is in my opinion a good idea.  Facade may not be the same as greed, but both describe his character... and Greedo would sound like a Star Wars reference, even if it would be a more accurate translation.
